title: Primož Roglič Opens up about Career Crisis after Tour de France Crash: ‘I Don’t Need to Suffer All This’
content:
Roglič reveals how he questioned his cycling future in the weeks before his record-equaling fourth Vuelta a España victory.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Opens up about Career Crisis after Tour de France Crash: ‘I Don’t Need to Suffer All This’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
